description: This file defines a React component 'ChatInterface' for a chat UI, including state management, message handling, rendering of chat messages, and interaction with an external API ('getResponse'). It includes UI elements like avatars, markdown rendering, and input forms.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Interface representing a chat message, including its ID, role ('user' or 'bot'), and content.

methods.name: ChatInterface
methods.description: React functional component that manages a chat interface, handling message state, user input, loading state, and rendering chat UI elements.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission: sends user input to getResponse API, manages message state, handles errors, and toggles loading state.
